accepts the investment money from the contributor and locks it. "}},"title":"A decentralized Crowdfunding Platform","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"constructor":{"notice":"_status is set to _NOT_ENTERED initially"},"refund(address,address)":{"notice":"_status value changes to _ENTERED as soon as refund is called, if someone tries to re-enter the _status != _ENTERED check fails and avoids any re-entrancy.
